data.name: Shootball Arena
data.detailed_description:
Shootball Arena is a fast paced online multiplayer game in which football and third person shooter merge together.
Choose your avatar, hold your favorite gun and challenge your friends in exciting matches up to ten players.
You need speed, agility and a perfect shot… do you have what it takes?



Features
  • Choose from different arenas
  • Challenge your friends in exciting matches up to 10 players
  • Take the field with your favorite avatar
  • Hold the gun that best matches your playing style
  • Pick up different power ups scattered all over the field

data.short_description: Shootball Arena is a fast paced online multiplayer game in which football and third person shooter merge together. Choose your avatar, hold your favorite gun and challenge your friends in exciting matches up to ten players. You need speed, agility and a perfect shot… do you have what it takes?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD quad core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia or Radeon with Shader 3.0 support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
